title: 188: Four reasons why classical education can't happen
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, we discuss David Hicks's (yep, THAT David Hicks, the one who wrote "Norms and Nobility") article "Is Classical Education Still Possible?" If we agree with him, it could mean that two of us are out of a job, and three of us are out of a podcast.
itunes:author: one guy who's doing great and two fellas who'll soon be out of a job
itunes:subtitle: Spoiler: A.J. takes issue with one of them
itunes:summary: In this episode, we discuss David Hicks's (yep, THAT David Hicks, the one who wrote "Norms and Nobility") article "Is Classical Education Still Possible?" If we agree with him, it could mean that two of us are out of a job, and three of us are out of a podcast.
